entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
